mapper.select: SELECT plan.ID, plan.date_day, plan.date_plan, plan.time_start, plan.time_end, plan.charge AS chargeId, plan.purpose AS purposeId, user_infor.fullname AS charge, purpose.purpose AS purpose, plan.status FROM plan JOIN user_infor ON plan.charge = user_infor.ID JOIN purpose ON plan.purpose = purpose.ID WHERE plan.ID = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE plan SET status = 'キャンセル' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE plan SET status = '予約中' WHERE id = #{id}
